name: Beating the Map
description:
Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2.0 (July 2020) "Out of control" (but they didn't wait for us to upload)
Thanks to Aenjo, savageminion21, princessQuaki, and fourtyTwoIsNotEnough

Hold space to jump higher
Activate the control panel to the right, and left, then make your way quickly to the top
